rukus.text: 73|1|I o atama kara matou mono (muhanmado) yo,
73|2|Yakan ni (reihai ni)-tate, sho toki o nozoite.
73|3|Yakan no hanbun, mata sore yori mo sukoshi chidjimete (reihai ni tate),
73|4|aruiwa, sore yori mo sukoshi oku reihai ni (tate), soshite yukkuri to shinchona choshi de, kuruan o yome.
73|5|Yagate ware wa, sochona o kotoba (kuruan) o anata ni kudasudearou.
73|6|Hontoni yakan (reihai) ni okiru koto wa, mottomo chikaradzuyoi ayumideari, okotoba o isso meikaku ni suru.
73|7|Hontoni anata wa, hiruma wa yomu de nagaku owa reru.
73|8|Sorede anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi, seikon o katamukete kare ni tsukae nasai.
73|9|Azuma to nishi no omode ara re, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Sore de kare o, o tsuchi subeki ho to shite aogi nasai.
73|10|Kare-ra no iu koto o taeshinobi, kare-ra o hanare yo, rippa ni mi o kawase.
73|11|Gense no tomi ni azukatte uso-tsuki yobawari suru mono-tachi o ware ni yudanete, shibarakunoaida kare-ra o nao kumishi nasai,
73|12|hontoni ware no temoto ni wa kusari ga ari, mata hono mo aru.
73|13|(Nodo ni)-byo eru shokumotsu ga ari, mata itamashi chobatsu ga aru.
73|14|Sonohi, daichi to yamayama wa shindo shi, yamayama wa kuzure nagarete, suna no katamari ni narudearou.
73|15|Hontoni ware wa, anata gata no shonin to suru tame ni, shito o anata gata ni tsukawashita. Ware ga katsute, firuaun ni hitori no shito o okutta yo ni.
73|16|Daga firuaun wa sono shito ni shitagawanakattanode, ware wa kare o kibishiku basshite hametsu sa seta.
73|17|Moshi anata gataga izentoshite (arra o) kyohi surunara, kodomo ga (kyofu no amari) shiraga ni naru hi, anata gata wa doshite jibun o mamoreyou ka.
73|18|Sonohi, ten wa sake chirudearou. Kare no yakusoku wa, kanarazu kansui sa reru nodearu.
73|19|Hontoni kore wa kunkaidearu. Sore de nozomu mono ni,-nushi e no michi o tora se nasai.
